comments.author: geoff@thunderbird.net
comments.raw_text: It should be possible to have multiple <rows> as children of a <grid> (in the same way an HTML <table> can have multiple <tbody> children), however doing so produces rows that are drawn on top of each other.
comments.text:
Created attachment 533612
testcase

It should be possible to have multiple <rows> as children of a <grid> (in the same way an HTML <table> can have multiple <tbody> children), however doing so produces rows that are drawn on top of each other.
